name: multi-location-pos-system
description: Multi-location POS System with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install && cp -r ../frontend/build ./frontend-build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
